thread.title: Kanye West Had a Change of Heart Over His Support For Donald Trump
thread.title_full: Kanye West Had a Change of Heart Over His Support For Donald Trump

author: Jasmine Grant
title: Kanye West Had a Change of Heart Over His Support For Donald Trump
text:
Kanye West Had a Change of Heart Over His Support For Donald Trump Welcome to the club, Ye'! by Jasmine Grant 3h ago 
Kanye West tried to give Donald Trump a chance, but apparently he’s now seen the light. 
The rapper has reportedly erased all of his past tweets supporting Donald Trump. TMZ reports that Mr. West had a change of heart and is un-endorsing Trump because of the bogus executive orders the president has signed during his few short weeks in office, most notably the “ Muslim ban .” 
Two of these now disappeared tweets in particular addressed his widely criticized meeting between Yeezy and the newly elected president at the Trump Towers back in December. Ye’, then fresh out of the hospital , decided a conversation was necessary to “have a direct line of communication” with the president about “multicultural issues” that affect the urban community. Well, apparently Kanye is learning what we’ve all known this whole time: multicultural issues aren’t really at the top of the agenda for Trump. 
Kanye isn’t alone in his anti-Trump feelings. His wife Kim Kardashian hopped on Twitter to hit us with a few facts poking holes in Trump’s paranoia about terrorist threats. 
So now that Kanye is officially anti-Trump, we’ll see how serious he is about his 2020 presidential run . 
Watch The Breaks star Teyana Taylor talk starring in Kanye West’s sexy music video for “Fade.”
